p0.label: Site Description
p0.text: Easily create personalized activities using artificial intelligence (AI). Suitable for all types of youth organizations and leadership programs, including scouts, teen groups, outdoor education programs, camp counselors, and more.

p1.label: The app is currently in the testing phase, and we aim to improve it continuously. We’d appreciate feedback if you encounter any issues or glitches.
p1.text: Use of the app is at your own risk, and we bear no responsibility for any damage that may result from its use.

p2.label: Privacy Policy:
p2.text: We use cookies and data voluntarily provided by users (such as name, email, and message content) to enhance the app experience and analyze statistical data. We may periodically conduct usability tests to improve the user interface.

p3.label: Advertising Services:
p3.text: We use Google’s advertising services, such as Google AdSense, to display ads on the site. Google and its partners may use cookies and additional tracking technologies to collect information about your activity on our site and serve personalized ads. You can manage your preferences for personalized ads through Google’s ad settings.
